page.title: 02RECREATION.
page.content: The recreation facilities in Troon are varied. They appeal to a wide range of tastes.Several golf courses are dotted around the town. The most famous is the ROYAL TROON which is a championship grade course.GOLF IS a SCOTTISH game. The OPEN GOLF CHAMPIONSHIP will be played in Troon in the year 1987.Tennis is also popular.There is a thriving club and tournaments are played on all- weather courts each weekend .Being a seaside town Troon also boasts a host of watersports. The Cruising Club is composed of cruiser/racers involved in a vast racing programme.A new sport for young people B.M.X. is expanding. There is a racing circuit in Troon. The young people find it a healthy and creative leisure sport.Great fun for all. The new sport of 1985.
